00005 extern isr_t interrupt_handlers[256];
00006 
00007 void isr_handler(idt_call_registers_t regs)
00008 {
00009 
00010     if (interrupt_handlers[regs.int_no] != 0)
00011     {
00012         isr_t handler = interrupt_handlers[regs.int_no];
